title: Identify the input values
text: When considering $$y$$ as a function of $$x$$, the input variable is $$x$$.

title: Identify the output values
text: When considering $$y$$ as a function of $$x$$, the output variable is $$y$$.

title: Classify the relation
text: Try writing the equation in terms of $$y=$$ [expression of x], and examine this new equation.

title: Classify the relation
text: When $$x$$ is not $$\frac{3}{7}$$, $$y=\frac{x+5}{7x-3}$$. Each $$x$$ only leads to a specific $$y$$. When $$x$$ equals $$\frac{3}{7}$$, $$y$$ is not exist, so $$\frac{3}{7}$$ is not in the domain.
